archive_saver.h
1 #ifndef VISTLE_ARCHIVE_SAVER_H
2 #define VISTLE_ARCHIVE_SAVER_H
3 
4 #include "archives.h"
5 #include "shmvector.h"
6 
7 #include <boost/mpl/for_each.hpp>
8 
9 namespace vistle {
10 
11 struct V_COREEXPORT ArraySaver {
12 
13  ArraySaver(const std::string &name, int type, vistle::oarchive &ar, const void *array=nullptr): m_ok(false), m_name(name), m_type(type), m_ar(ar), m_array(array) {}
14  ArraySaver() = delete;
15  ArraySaver(const ArraySaver &other) = delete;
16 
17  template<typename T>
18  void operator()(T) {
19  if (shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>::typeId() != m_type) {
20  //std::cerr << "ArraySaver: type mismatch - looking for " << m_type << ", is " << shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>::typeId() << std::endl;
21  return;
22  }
23 
24  if (m_ok) {
25  m_ok = false;
26  std::cerr << "ArraySaver: multiple type matches for data array " << m_name << std::endl;
27  return;
28  }
29  ShmVector<T> arr;
30  if (m_array) {
31  arr = *reinterpret_cast<const ShmVector<T> *>(m_array);
32  } else {
33  arr = Shm::the().getArrayFromName<T>(m_name);
34  }
35  if (!arr) {
36  std::cerr << "ArraySaver: did not find data array " << m_name << std::endl;
37  return;
38  }
39  m_ar & m_name;
40  m_ar & *arr;
41  m_ok = true;
42  }
43 
44  bool save() {
45  boost::mpl::for_each<VectorTypes>(boost::reference_wrapper<ArraySaver>(*this));
46  if (!m_ok) {
47  std::cerr << "ArraySaver: failed to save array " << m_name << " to archive" << std::endl;
48  }
49  return m_ok;
50  }
51 
52  bool m_ok;
53  std::string m_name;
54  int m_type;
55  vistle::oarchive &m_ar;
56  const void *m_array = nullptr;
57 };
58 
59 class V_COREEXPORT DeepArchiveSaver: public Saver, public std::enable_shared_from_this<DeepArchiveSaver> {
60 public:
61  void saveArray(const std::string &name, int type, const void *array) override;
62  void saveObject(const std::string &name, obj_const_ptr obj) override;
63  SubArchiveDirectory getDirectory();
64 
65 private:
66  std::map<std::string,std::vector<char>> m_objects;
67  std::map<std::string,std::vector<char>> m_arrays;
68 };
69

71 
72 }
73 #endif
